name: The Adventures of Tomley Kleene
overview:
It's time for a new hero! Here comes Tomley Kleene, and he's ready for anything! Fight Granks and Frumps, and kill all the enemies to move on!

In the Adventures of Tomley Kleene, you have the chance to play as a little yellow ball who's not scared of anything. With more better graphics and pure awesomeness than other downloadable homebrew games, this game will have you at the edge of your seat for minutes at a time!

Do you have what it takes to beat all the bad guys and safely lead Tomley through the levels? Probably not, but don't let that stop you from trying!

Tomley Kleene is fun to play alone, or team up with a buddy to prolong the adventure.
